Features:
• Automatic server file downloads & updates
• AOT compilation for fast startup (auto-generated)

• Automatic backups with retention

2. Visit URL and enter code to authenticate downloader
3. Once booted, run: /auth login device
4. Follow the URL + code shown
5. Players can now connect!

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -e

cd /mnt/server

echo ""
echo "========================================"
echo "  Hybrowse Hytale Server Installation"
echo "========================================"
echo ""

chown -R 1000:1000 /mnt/server 2>/dev/null || true
chmod -R 755 /mnt/server

echo "Directory prepared for Hytale server."
echo ""
echo "The Docker image handles:"
echo "  - Automatic server downloads"
echo "  - AOT cache generation"
echo "  - CurseForge mods (optional)"
echo "  - Automatic backups (optional)"
echo ""
echo "========================================"
echo "  AUTHENTICATION (First Start)"
echo "========================================"
echo ""
echo "1. Start server - watch for device code URL"
echo "2. Visit URL, enter code to download files"
echo "3. After boot, run: /auth login device"
echo "4. Follow URL + code to authenticate"
echo "5. Done! Players can connect."
echo ""
echo "========================================"
echo ""

variables.name: Server Name
variables.description: Display name for your Hytale server (shown in server list). Maps to config.json ServerName.

variables.name: MOTD
variables.description: Message of the Day shown to players when they join. Maps to config.json MOTD.

variables.name: Max Players
variables.description: Maximum number of players allowed on the server. Maps to config.json MaxPlayers.

variables.name: Default World
variables.description: Name of the default world players spawn into. Maps to config.json Defaults.World.

variables.name: View Distance
variables.description: Maximum view radius in chunks. Higher = more RAM needed. Maps to config.json MaxViewRadius.

variables.name: Server Port
variables.description: UDP port for Hytale (QUIC protocol). Must match your allocation. Used to set HYTALE_BIND.

variables.name: Auto Download
variables.description: Automatically download Hytale server files using the official downloader. First run requires device code authentication.

variables.name: Auto Update
variables.description: Check for and download server updates on startup. Only applies when HYTALE_AUTO_DOWNLOAD is enabled.

variables.name: JVM Memory (MB)
variables.description: Maximum JVM heap size in megabytes. Examples: 4096 (4GB), 8192 (8GB), 16384 (16GB). Maps to -Xmx.

variables.name: JVM Min Memory (MB)
variables.description: Minimum JVM heap size in megabytes. Set to 0 to not specify. Recommended: same as max for dedicated servers. Maps to -Xms.

variables.name: AOT Cache
variables.description: Ahead-Of-Time compilation for faster startup. auto = generate if missing, true = require existing cache, false = disable AOT.

variables.name: Authentication Mode
variables.description: Server authentication mode. authenticated = requires Hytale login, offline = no auth required, insecure = testing only.

variables.name: Enable Backups
variables.description: Enable automatic world backups. Uses --backup flag.

variables.name: Backup Frequency (min)
variables.description: Minutes between backups. Only applies if backups enabled. Uses --backup-frequency flag.

variables.name: Backup Retention
variables.description: Number of backups to keep. Oldest deleted automatically. Uses --backup-max-count flag.

variables.name: CurseForge Mods
variables.description: Space or newline separated CurseForge mod IDs. Supports inline comments with #. Example: 123456 234567 # My mods

variables.name: CurseForge API Key
variables.description: API key from console.curseforge.com. Required for mod downloads. Note: $ characters must be escaped as $$ in Pterodactyl.

variables.name: CurseForge Release Channel
variables.description: Which mod releases to allow. release = stable only, beta = stable+beta, alpha = all versions.

variables.name: CurseForge Auto Update
variables.description: Automatically update mods to latest version on server start.

variables.name: Allow Self-Op
variables.description: Allow /op command for self-promotion. WARNING: Grants admin access to anyone who uses the command!

variables.name: Owner Name
variables.description: Hytale username to automatically grant owner privileges on first join.

variables.name: Owner UUID
variables.description: Hytale UUID to automatically grant owner privileges. Alternative to Owner Name.

variables.name: Machine ID
variables.description: 32-char hex string for auth persistence. Auto-generated if empty. Only set when migrating servers to preserve authentication.

variables.name: JVM Extra Args
variables.description: Additional JVM arguments for advanced tuning. Added after default JVM flags.

variables.name: Disable Sentry
variables.description: Disable error reporting to Hytale. Uses --disable-sentry flag.

variables.name: Accept Early Plugins
variables.description: Allow early-stage/experimental plugins to load. Uses --accept-early-plugins flag.

variables.name: Boot Command
variables.description: Command to execute automatically after server boots. Uses --boot-command flag.

variables.name: Extra Server Args
variables.description: Additional command-line arguments to pass directly to HytaleServer.jar.

variables.name: Timezone
variables.description: Server timezone for logging. Examples: America/New_York, Europe/London, UTC.
